meanings.definition: A three-wheeled vehicle used for transportation in some Asian countries.
meanings.sent1: In Thailand, trishaws are a common sight on the bustling streets.
meanings.sent2: The trishaws lined up neatly outside the market.
meanings.sent3: The trishaws seemed to chat with each other when no one was around.
meanings.sent4: The trishaws moved like colorful beetles along the narrow lanes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of trishaws echoed through the ancient city.

meanings.sent1: We saw a fleet of trishaws waiting for passengers.
meanings.sent2: The trishaws were decorated with bright flowers.
meanings.sent3: The trishaws huddled together as if sharing a secret.
meanings.sent4: The trishaws glinted in the sunlight like jewels on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The trishaws added a touch of nostalgia to the modern cityscape.
